QuestData.Title: Veil Rhaze: Unliving Evil
QuestData.Description: Veil Rhaze was a particularly wicked colony of Skettis.$b$bDespite the village's eradication by the Auchindoun disaster, Terokk's influence remained in the maligned spirits there. Travel west to Veil Rhaze and slay those murderous wretches. You'll find them to the west of the Shadow Tomb, on the border of Bone Wastes and Terokkar Forest.$b$bThis will be our first blow against Terokk and the guardians of Skettis.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 4 Deathtalon Spirits, 4 Screeching Spirits and 2 Spirit Ravens and return to Kirrik the Awakened at the Refugee Caravan.
QuestData.CompletionText: Evil grows in Veil Rhaze. Put it down, $r.
QuestData.RewardText: Those foul spirits deserved to die. The death they would have wrought on others is reason enough.$b$bWe cannot hope to redeem those in Terokk's grasp. But we shall deliver them a devastating blow in the name of the Light.
